member.name: T:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.CommandGrid
member.summary: A SkinnedCommandGrid is a Widget that behaves like the command list of Final Fantasy battle screens. It can only be controlled by keyboard and needs to be specifically assigned Focus on the WidgetController.

member.name: T:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController
member.summary: This Component can be assigned to a Camera in order to detect and manage Input events such as Mouse and Keyboard events and redirect said events to a BaseInputReceiver. It allows to specify a default BaseInputReceiver which can receive all enabled events regardless of its current status, and also to manage InputVisualReceivers in a way that allows the implementation of a basic GUI.

member.name: M:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.FocusedElement
member.summary: [GET] The currently Focused InputVisualReceiver

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.HoveredElement
member.summary: [GET] The currently Hovered InputVisualReceiver

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.KeyboardEnabled
member.summary: [GET / SET] If the Controller should register for Keyboard events

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.LeftMouseKey
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Keyboard key that will be treated as a Left Mouse click

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.MiddleMouseKey
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Keyboard key that will be treated as a Middle Mouse click

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.MouseEnabled
member.summary: [GET / SET] If the Controller should register for Mouse events

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.NextWidgetKeyModifier
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Keyboard key that will be used to focus on the next widget

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.PreviousWidgetKey
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Keyboard key that will be used to focus on the previous widget

member.name: P:SnowyPeak.Duality.Plugin.Frozen.UI.Widgets.WidgetController.RightMouseKey
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Keyboard key that will be treated as a Right Mouse click
